price: Na watakapo tupwa humo mahali dhiki, hali wamefungwa, wataombawafe.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا
footnotes: Na watapo tupwa katika pahali pembamba kwa kulingana na unene wao, nao wamefungwa pingu mikono yao kwenye shingo zao, watapiga kelele kuhimiza wateketezwe upesi upesi ili wapate kupumzika na kitisho cha adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ul'qū min'hā makānan ḍayyiqan muqarranīna daʿaw hunālika thubūran
